item.title: Supercharging YOLOv5: How I Got 182.4 FPS Inference Without a GPU
item.description: I am beginning to learn that it is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all. Laura Ingalls ðŸ”¥ Motivation After months of searching, you’ve finally found the one. The one object detection library that just works. No installation hassle, no package version mismatch, and no CUDA errors. I’m talking about the amazingly engineered YOLOv5 object detection library by Ultralytics. Elated, you quickly find an interesting dataset from Roboflow and finally trained a state-of-the-art (SOTA) YOLOv5 model to detect firearms from image streams.
